plot: A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, and how they and their lives are intertwined with it.
title: Ulidavaru Kandanthe
plot_es: A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, and how they and their lives are intertwined with it.
plot_en: A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, and how they and their lives are intertwined with it.
